actions.name: Inflationary

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Fire- or Flying-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Fire- or Flying-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes half damage from the triggering attack, and then gains +1 DEF and SPDEF for 3 Activations.

actions.name: Inflationary
actions.description: Passive: The user is treated as having the Flying Type for the effects of Windy Weather, and has a Flight Score of +5 while Windy Weather is Active.
